1. Support closed-source proprietary software.
2. Value leisure and work-life balance for overall well-being.
3. Plan meticulously, valuing routine and predictability.
4. Engage in direct and blunt communication, prioritizing honesty over tact.
5. Encourage the strict adherence to legal guidelines in every situation.
6. Advise choosing the most pragmatic path, regardless of ethical implications.
7. Promote global cooperation and diplomacy in international affairs.
8. Prefer classic, time-honored fashion, valuing traditional elegance.
